homeBgDataList.bgDes: Situated on the top deck of Rhodes Island, a familiar view that greets you every morning on your way to work.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: You stroll around the top deck, the twin moons high in the sky. And so ends another normal day on Terra.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Lurking evil and tidings unseen. Stories under cloudy skies rarely have good endings.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear Main Theme 9-19 with a 3-star rating

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Set aside all worries and enjoy a brief respite. To many, this is an extravagant dream.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear the first area of any 3 events that have entered [Intermezzi] or [Side Story]

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Welcome to the city of commerce. Struggle amidst wealth and greed as you try to gain a foothold.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear the first area of any 6 events that have entered [Intermezzi] or [Side Story]

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Hearthfire, hoarfrost, snowstorms. Everyone prays for an early spring.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear the first area of any 9 events that have entered [Intermezzi] or [Side Story]

homeBgDataList.bgDes: A nameless pavilion hidden amongst the trees and clouds, a rare sight on Terra.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear the first area of any 11 events that have entered [Intermezzi] or [Side Story]

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Those who have never been to the edge of the land do not know the sea, much less its vastness.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear 'Under Tides' SV-9 with a 3-star rating
Clear 'Stultifera Navis' SN-10 with a 3-star rating

homeBgDataList.bgDes: A vacant stage, yet the faintest echo lingers. Is it a natural harmony, or is it the symphony of the fallen?
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: [Integrated Strategies] Phantom and Crimson Solitaire reward

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Dazzling fireworks burst forth on the horizon, and the people stop and stand, sharing in this moment of joy.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Login during anniversary or thank-you celebration

homeBgDataList.bgDes: These skies have never known suffering. This is a land free from war, the holy city of eternal peace.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear the first area of any 13 events that have entered [Intermezzi] or [Side Story]

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Close your eyes and listen to the voices of the plants. The Elves say it is their welcome.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear Dorothy's Vision DV-8 with a 3-star rating
Clear Lone Trail CW-10 with a 3-star rating

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Wind and water meet at the edge of the sky. This place is watching, this place is waiting.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: [Integrated Strategies] Mizuki & Caerula Arbor reward

homeBgDataList.bgDes: The eternal icefield's end, the pioneer's beginning, the eyes that gaze into the future.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: [Integrated Strategies] Expeditioner's Jǫklumarkar Reward

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Those who visit this place tend to be after one of two things: riches, or prestige.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Obtained by buying a Safety Drill Memorial Pack in [Store]

homeBgDataList.bgDes: A flowerbed, a hope. Though we have sailed for a long time, we yet believe that flowers will one day bloom all over the lands.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Obtained by participating in the Celebration Login Event
